description:
This is a full-time on-site role as a Hostel Warden located in Kathmandu. As a Hostel Warden, you will be responsible for day-to-day tasks such as overseeing hostel operations, ensuring the safety and well-being of residents, managing room allocations, maintaining cleanliness, and resolving any conflicts or issues that may arise. Additionally, you will be responsible for maintaining documentation, enforcing hostel rules and regulations, and building a positive and inclusive community among residents.

  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills
  • Ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks
  • Attention to detail and organizational skills
  • Ability to work independently and in a team
  • Prior experience in a similar role or customer service is preferred
  • Basic computer skills
  • Fluency in Nepali and English languages

description:
• Maintain discipline in accordance with the rules and disciplinary systems of the school 
  • Plan, prepare and deliver instructional activities that facilitate active learning experiences 
  • Organizing the classroom and learning resources and creating displays to encourage a positive learning environment 
  • Preparing and marking work to facilitate positive pupil development.
  • Assist the teachers.

Other Specification 

  • Minimum of a bachelor’s degree from a reputed University.
  • Good subject Knowledge
  • Applicants must be suitably qualified
  • Ability to work as a part of a team, motivated and committed, willing to learn and grow.
  • Maintain a positive attitude and contribute towards a quality environment
  • Fluency in written and spoken English and Nepali language
  • Good-looking, smart, energetic and enthusiastic
  • Computer knowledge: MS Word, Excel, Internet, Email.
  • Ability to work under pressure.

location: Mandikhatar, Maharajgunj, Gatthaghar, Chhauni

Note: Female candidates are highly encouraged to apply.

description:
• Manage the promotion and distribution of ophthalmology products.
  • Oversee the sales strategies for pediatric and neonatology products.
  • Develop marketing plans for radiology products.
  • Conduct sales and marketing activities for urology products.
  • Handle the marketing and sales of hospital furniture.
  • Coordinate the promotion of OT equipment.
  • Implement sales strategies for CSSD.
  • Engage in marketing efforts for hospital infrastructure.
  • Focus on the sales of critical care products.
  • Drive the marketing and sales of dental equipment and consumables.
  • Promote and sell ENT products.
  • Manage the sales and marketing of neurology/neurosurgery products.

Requirements:

  • BBA/BBS with specialization in Marketing Management (preferable with Technical Diploma in Biomedical / Electric / Electronics / Mechanical Engineering or solid 1-3 years work experiences as Sales Manager/Officer/Executives in Medical Sectors with Science/Biology background
  • 1-3 Minimum  Yrs. Experience in Trading Business - Import/Export/Merchandising - preferably in supply of Medicines & related Medical Equipment and Accessories in various Health Care/Medical Divisions throughout Nepal.
  • Familiarity with the products or services being offered by the company.
  • Demonstrated ability to generate leads, negotiate, and close deals.
  • Proficient in developing and implementing marketing strategies.
  • Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients.

description:
• Design and improve the user interface for our website, ensuring it is visually appealing and easy to navigate.
  • Create user-centric designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback.
  • Collaborate with the development team to ensure the technical feasibility of designs.
  • Conduct user research and evaluate user feedback to enhance the usability of the website.
  • Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders.
  • Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate site function and appearance.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role.
  • Portfolio of design projects showcasing creativity and depth of thought.
  • Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Figma, Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
  • Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders.
  • Good time-management skills.

Benefits:

  • Opportunity to work with a dedicated and passionate team.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Professional growth and development opportunities.

description:
We are hiring paid business development associate intern for logistics company. 

  • Make and maintain a complete customer database in all targeted categories including existing and previous customers, as well as approach new customers,
  • Plan, strategize, and approach customers based on different products and services,
  • Analyze the sales performance in terms of retaining old and existing customers,
  • Other duties as assigned.

Other Specification:

  • Good spoken and written communication skills,
  • Friendly and able to coherently work with teams,
  • Basic knowledge and understanding of marketing and sales,
  • Good interpersonal skills,
  • Basic understanding of Excel,
  • Preference shall be given to BBA/BBM students,
  • Preference shall be given to the candidate having two-wheelers with a valid license 

NOTE: The internship will be for the first three months, and then it will be converted to a full-time staff.

description:
• Managing regular inventory and reconciliations Orders, Cash Collection, COD Payment, etc. 
  • Processing and fulfilling customer orders accurately and efficiently coordinating with the team to ensure timely picking, packing, and shipping of orders, and handling order discrepancies and returns.
  • Coordinating with team and rider to prepare route optimization and scheduling shipments with rider and 3PL logistics partners. Tracking shipments to ensure timely delivery and resolving any issues that arise during the shipping process
  • Developing and implementing logistics strategies to improve efficiency and reduce costs. Planning and optimizing routes for transportation to minimize delivery times and costs and analyzing logistics data to identify areas for improvement
  • Building and maintaining relationships with suppliers and vendors and ensuring suppliers comply with company policies and quality standards
  • Analyzing logistics and supply chain data to monitor performance, identify trends, and use data to make informed decisions and recommendations for process improvements.
  • Ensuring compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and company policies and maintaining accurate and up-to-date records and documentation for all logistics activities.
  • Addressing customer inquiries and concerns related to logistics and order fulfillment. Ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction through timely and accurate order processing and delivery and coordinating with the customer service team to resolve any logistics-related issues.
  • Working closely with other departments such as business development, and finance to align logistics activities with overall business objectives. Facilitating communication and coordination between different teams to ensure smooth operations
  • Utilizing logistics software and systems to manage and track inventory, orders, and shipments.

Other Specification 

  • Bachelor’s Running, preferably in supply chain management, logistics, business administration, or a related field.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent organizational and time management abilities.
  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Understanding of supply chain and logistics principles.
  • Ability to work well under pressure and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
  • Attention to detail and accuracy.

description:
• Host live streaming sessions to showcase products and engage with customers in real-time.
  • Develop and execute marketing strategies to promote live streaming events and products.
  • Produce high-quality content for social media, website, and other digital platforms.
  • Create compelling videos, graphics, and written content to support marketing and sales initiatives.
  • Work closely with the sales team to develop strategies for increasing product sales through digital channels.
  • Interact with customers through live chat, social media, and other platforms to build relationships and drive loyalty.

Other Specification 

  • Strong sales skills with a track record of achieving or exceeding sales targets.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Proficiency in using live streaming platforms (e.g., Facebook Live, Instagram Live, YouTube) and marketing tools.
  • Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas and content.
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Familiarity with social media trends and best practices.

description:
• Prepare and maintain accurate financial records and statements.
  • Ensure timely and accurate reporting of financial data, including monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
  • Assist in the preparation of budgets and forecasts.
  • Manage the accounts payable and receivable processes.
  • Ensure timely processing of invoices, payments, and collections.
  • Provide cost analysis and financial insights to support decision-making.
  • Maintain and enhance financial systems and processes to improve efficiency and accuracy.
  • Collaborate with site management and project teams to provide financial support and insights.
  • Act as a liaison between the site and the corporate finance team

Other Specialization:

  • achelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
  • Professional accounting certification (e.g., CPA, ACCA, CIMA) is preferred.
  • Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in accounting or finance roles, preferably in a construction, manufacturing, or project-based environment.
  • Strong knowledge of accounting principles and practices.
  • Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel).
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy.

• Completing writing projects, meeting deadlines and following content requirements in terms of style and project specifications
  • Revising content whenever customers or clients request changes
  • Helping create style guides or suggesting changes to ensure content is consistent and clear
  • Working with customers to define their content needs
  • Conducting research on any given topic
  • Optimizing articles for SEO and accessibility
  • Writing engaging content for blogs, ebooks, case studies, video scripts, infographics and other assets
  • Identifying gaps in content and recommending new topics
  • Editing content to ensure voice, grammar and style is on point
  • Creating and scheduling posts for multiple social media channels
  • Staying up to date on industry trends to support content development
  • Distilling complex concepts and language into content that is easily understood
  • Working closely with internal stakeholders to ensure alignment and consistency in messaging, branding and style
  • Managing and completing work on time for multiple content writing projects
  • Working with content strategists to build editorial calendars

description:
• Assisting with day to day operations of the HR functions and duties
  • Providing clerical and administrative support to Human Resources executives
  • Compiling and updating employee records (hard and soft copies)
  • Process documentation and prepare reports relating to personnel activities (staffing, recruitment, training, grievances, performance evaluations etc)
  • Coordinate HR projects (meetings, training, surveys etc) and take minutes
  • Deal with employee requests regarding human resources issues, rules, and regulations
  • Assist in payroll preparation by providing relevant data (absences, bonus, leaves, etc)
  • Properly handle complaints and grievance procedures
  • Reconciling invoices and identifying discrepancies
  • Creating and updating expense reports
  • Processing reimbursement forms
  • Prepare bank deposits
  • Enter financial transactions into internal databases
  • Check spreadsheets for accuracy
  • Maintain digital and physical financial records
  • Issue invoices to customers and external partners, as needed
  • Review and file payroll documents

description:
• Provide professional hair styling services to clients based on their preferences and needs.
  • Consult with clients to understand their desired look and offer expert advice on hair care and maintenance.
  • Perform haircuts, color treatments, and styling techniques such as blowouts, curling, and straightening.
  • Keep up-to-date with the latest trends in hair fashion and techniques to offer innovative and on-trend services.

Other Specification:

  • Proven experience as a Hairdresser or Hairstylist, with a portfolio of past work.
  • Certification or license in cosmetology or hairdressing from a recognized institution.
  • Strong knowledge of hair care products, tools, and techniques.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment while maintaining high standards of quality.
  • Creativity and artistic flair with a passion for hair styling and fashion.

description:
The job description of a model for creative development typically includes:

1.Collaboration: Work closely with creative directors, photographers, stylists, and other team members to conceptualize and develop visual content.

2.Creative Input: Offer creative ideas and suggestions to enhance the overall vision of projects.

3.Versatility: Adapt to various themes, concepts, and styles, and bring creativity and innovation to each project.

4.Professionalism: Maintain a positive attitude, adhere to schedules, and communicate effectively with the team.

5.Brand Representation: Represent the brand or client effectively, embodying their values and vision through visual storytelling.

6.Portfolio Development: Continuously work on expanding and diversifying your portfolio with unique and compelling content.

7.Market Awareness: Stay updated on industry trends, styles, and concepts to bring fresh perspectives to projects.

8.Adaptability: Be flexible and open to feedback, adjusting your performance to meet the evolving needs of each project.

9.Attention to Detail: Pay close attention to grooming, styling, and overall presentation to ensure the desired aesthetic is achieved.

10.Networking: Build and maintain relationships within the industry to foster future collaboration opportunities and career growth.

description:
• Develop new menu options based on seasonal changes and customer demand.
  • Assist with the preparation and planning of meal designs.
  • Ensure that kitchen activities operate in a timely manner.
  • Resolve customer problems and concerns personally.
  • Monitor and record inventory, and if necessary, order new supplies.
  • Provide support to junior kitchen employees with various tasks including line cooking, food preparation, and dish plating.
  • Recruit and train new kitchen employees to meet restaurant and kitchen standards.
  • Create schedules for kitchen employees and evaluate their performance.
  • Adhere to and implement sanitation regulations and safety regulations.
  • Manage the kitchen team in the executive chef's absence.

Other Specifications:

  • Proven experience as a Sous Chef or in a similar role within a high-volume kitchen.
  • Strong culinary skills and a passion for food, with knowledge of various cuisines and cooking techniques.
  • Excellent leadership and management abilities, with the capacity to motivate and inspire a team.
  • Exceptional organizational and time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality culinary experiences.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with kitchen staff and other team members.
  • Knowledge of food safety and sanitation regulations, with a focus on maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in the kitchen.
  • Ability to work well under pressure and in a fast-paced environment.
  • Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required.
  • Culinary degree or relevant certification is a plus.

Note: The job location is available at both Budhanilkantha and Biratnagar.

description:
• Accurately measuring meal ingredients for the Chef de Partie.
  • Preparing meal ingredients, which includes seasoning of different meats as well as washing, peeling, and chopping vegetables and fruits.
  • Preparing basic salads and sauces as directed by the Chef de Partie.
  • Receiving deliveries and verifying that all ordered items have been delivered and are of good quality.
  • Taking inventory of restaurant supplies and notifying the supervisor of low or depleted supplies.
  • Discarding all expired and spoiled food items stored in the stock rooms, refrigerators, and freezers.
  • Performing basic cleaning duties and ensuring that workstations are properly sanitized.
  • Plating and presenting meal items as per the Chef de Partie’s instructions.

Note: The job location is available at both Budhanilkantha, Durbar Marg, Mhepi, Anamnagar and Biratnagar.

jobTitle: Customer service cum sales and marketing
description:
This is a full-time on-site role for a Customer Service cum Sales Executive located in Kathmandu. The Customer Service cum Sales Executive will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service, handling inquiries and complaints, assisting customers with product information, and upselling products and services. The role also involves generating sales leads and meeting sales targets.

Qualifications:

  • Excellent customer service and communication skills
  • Strong sales and negotiation skills
  • Ability to handle customer inquiries and complaints
  • Knowledge of sales techniques and strategies
  • Experience in customer service or sales roles
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Ability to meet sales targets
  • Positive attitude and willingness to learn
  • Education: bachelor completed
  • At list 6 month of experience in sales or customer service

companyName: Bandipur Cable car and Tourism Ltd.
description:
Bandipur Cable Car is a leading provider of scenic cable car rides in the picturesque region of Bandipur. We are committed to offering unforgettable experiences to our visitors while preserving the natural beauty of the area. As part of our expansion and continuous improvement efforts, we are seeking a skilled and experienced Accounts Officer to join our team.

Responsibilities:

  • Aid the legal team in conducting legal research on various topics related to tourism, hospitality, contracts, regulatory compliance, and corporate law.
  • Assist in drafting and reviewing legal documents, such as contracts, agreements, policies, and correspondence.
  • Help maintain and organize legal files and documentation to ensure accuracy and accessibility.

Requirements:

  • Strong interest in corporate law, commercial transactions, and/or tourism law. 
  • Currently pursuing a BALLB/BBM-LLB from a recognized law college.
  • Proficient in legal research tools and MS Office applications.
  • Fluent in English and Nepali typing.
  • Able to commit a minimum of 6 hours per day in the office.
  • Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
  • Good interpersonal and communication abilities.

description:
• Make Phone calls/ Email to potential customers/ Leads.
  • Facilitate lead generation by conducting market research, engaging in cold calling & schedule meetings for PR 
  • Support Supervisor in sales presentations, proposals, and product demonstrations to prospective clients.
  • Provide essential assistance to sales representatives in managing customer database, generating quotes, contract, and addressing customer inquiries.
  • Participating in industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to showcase company products and services.
  • Participate in sales meetings and presentations to gain valuable insights into the sales process and customer interactions.
  • Prepare daily, weekly and monthly reports.
  • Helping with the planning and hosting of marketing events.
  • Visiting Clients for the contract while necessary.
  • Other task assigned by the manager.

Specification:

  • Must have good communication skill.
  • Proficiency in MS Office, Internet browsing and market research
  • Punctual and disciplined.
  • Must have own device (Laptop)
  • Own vehicle with a valid driving license is a plus

What We Offer

  • Paid Internship
  • Lunch provided
  • Attractive incentive
  • Exposure to first cyber security platform of Nepal (Bugv)
  • Daily free Lunch
  • Friendly work environment
  • Market exposure
  • Fuel reimbursement for client visit

description:
• Dealing with flat steel products such as MS Pipe, MS Plates, HR Shutter Guides, and CR Shutter Profiles. 
  • Agreements with customers must adhere to the company's strict Sales & Marketing Policies.
  • Sales are only accepted in Bank Guarantee / LC and advance Cash, with payment collections within aging limits of all customers. 
  • Responsibilities include managing key accounts, maintaining client relations,
  • Handling the supply chain to develop strong customer relationships.
  • Maintaining and increasing sales, achieving set targets, expanding the customer base, 
  • Developing sales strategies,
  • Dealt with major customer accounts and stayed updated on products and competitors.

Other Specifications:

  • 10+2/Bachelor Degree in Management/Marketing
  • MALE CANDIDATES ONLY  
  • 1-2 years of experience as a Sales Officer in Manufacturing Companies of Steels Products as mentioned in Job Responsibilities                                                                       

Note: Preference shall be given to male candidates with their own Motorbike and valid Driving License

description:
• Overseeing the internal audit process, accounting, and finance of Siddhivinayak Steels Pvt. Ltd. and Goenka Electronics Pvt. Ltd., as well as strategic management and decision-making processes. 
  • This includes financial planning, forecasting, insurance, risk management, interest reconciliation, bank advice, loans, Letter of Credit, MIS reporting, and marketing plans. Experience in trading and manufacturing industries in Nepal is required
  • Be involved in Strategic Management and Decision-making processes before the beginning of the Fiscal Year by reviewing, formulating, drafting, controlling, implementing, measuring, and correcting wise Plans & Policies.
  • Carry out overall Insurance & Risk Management related works.
  • Be responsible for all interest reconciliation and bank advice-related work.
  • Carry out all Letter of Credit (LC) related as well as Insurance related works.
  • Review, plan, formulate, implement, and control all Marketing Plans & Policies of various products under all Companies of Goenka Group.
  • Must have a thorough knowledge of Accounting, Auditing, Tax, and Finance with all banking-related works (Loans, LC, etc.) with experiences in Trading (Import/Export Business) and Manufacturing Industries in Nepal.
  • All other works related to Finance/Accounting/Auditing/Sales Accounting/Marketing/Recovery of all Companies under the Goenka Group as instructed by the department Head (CFO) and the Management.

Other Requirements:

  • Semi-Qualified Chartered Accountants (CA preferably from ICAN-Nepal) but from ICAI are also welcome.
  • 2 + Yrs. experience in LC, Banking, Auditing, Finance, and Accounting work in Manufacturing Industries and Trading Business (Import/Export Business) in Nepal. (preferable Steels/Edible Oil Industries/Consumer Electronics  & FMCG Businesses)
  • Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial processes, and regulatory requirements.
  • Proficiency in financial software systems and MS Office applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
  • Excellent attention to detail and accuracy in financial data management and analysis.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret financial information.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
  • Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong organizational and time management skills.
  • Demonstrated integrity and ethical behavior in handling financial matters.
  • Only male candidates can apply for this position

Note: Salary and perks are as mentioned above but in some cases as negotiable for deserving candidates with exact experiences in the designated positions as mentioned above

description:
A salesperson selling Rikishi compost would typically be responsible for promoting and selling compost products made by Rikishi. The job description might include:

Product Knowledge: Thorough understanding of Rikishi compost products, including their ingredients, benefits, and applications. This knowledge would be crucial for effectively communicating with potential customers and addressing their inquiries.

Sales and Marketing: Developing and implementing sales strategies to promote Rikishi compost products to potential customers, which may include gardeners, farmers, landscaping companies, and agricultural businesses. This involves identifying target markets, generating leads, and converting leads into sales.

Customer Relationship Management: Building and maintaining relationships with customers to understand their needs and provide personalized recommendations. This may involve conducting product demonstrations, offering samples, and providing after-sales support.

Market Research: Keeping abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences to identify opportunities for product improvement and market expansion. This information can also be used to adjust sales strategies accordingly.

Networking: Actively engaging in networking activities such as attending industry events, trade shows, and conferences to promote Rikishi compost products and establish connections with potential customers, distributors, and partners.

Order Processing and Fulfillment: Managing the sales process from order placement to delivery, ensuring timely and accurate processing of orders, coordinating with logistics teams, and resolving any issues or discrepancies that may arise.

Sales Reporting and Analysis: Tracking sales performance, preparing sales reports, and analyzing data to evaluate the effectiveness of sales strategies and identify areas for improvement.

Training and Education: Providing training and educational resources to customers and sales team members on the benefits and proper usage of Rikishi compost products.

Overall, the role of a salesperson selling Rikishi compost involves a combination of product knowledge, sales and marketing skills, customer relationship management, and a commitment to achieving sales targets and promoting sustainable and environmentally-friendly gardening and agricultural practices.

description:
As an Online Telecaller, your primary responsibility will be:

  • Make outbound calls to prospective customers in a virtual office setting,
  • Promoting and selling products or services over the phone, 
  • Maintaining customer relationships, and achieving sales targets. 

Other Specifications:

  • Excellent communication skills, 
  • Adaptability to online platforms,
  • Ability to work independently while adhering to company guidelines.

description:
We are currently seeking maths graduates and engineers for our math article writing project. Our math writers develop rich, quality lessons for students from pre kg to middle school that contribute to our library of engaging online lessons in various math concepts. So, if you have an analytical mind for numbers, an academic qualification in maths and a skill for presenting work academically, then we’d love to hear from you.

Project

Given a lesson outline/problem, you’ll create an engaging written lesson/solution between 1000-2000 words. Each lesson will conclude with a summary to emphasize key concepts and solutions to the problem.

Requirements

  • You have a bachelor's degree in Mathematics/Engineering
  • You have expert knowledge of mathematical concepts
  • You have very strong writing skills
  • You can clearly write online educational content 
  • You’re committed to providing high-quality, accurate information 
  • You have a working knowledge of online research methods
  • You have excellent communication skills and are responsive and collaborative

What we offer

  • Healthy and Peaceful work environment
  • Timely, reliable payments

Salary: 20000 to 25000 NPR

description:
• Provide prompt and courteous assistance to customers via phone, email, live chat, or in-person interactions.
  • Address customer inquiries, concerns, and issues with professionalism, patience, and empathy.
  • Listen actively to understand customer needs and offer accurate information and solutions.
  • Effectively navigate computer systems, databases, and software to access customer information and provide assistance.
  • Handle customer requests, such as order tracking, product information, billing inquiries, and technical support.
  • Maintain a positive and friendly attitude to create a welcoming customer experience.
  • Handle challenging and demanding customer situations with professionalism and a calm demeanor.
  • Follow up with customers to ensure their inquiries are fully resolved and their needs are met.
  • Participate in ongoing training and professional development to enhance customer service skills.
  • Provide feedback to team leads or supervisors to improve customer service processes.

Other Specification:

  • High school diploma or equivalent; some college education preferred.
  • Previous experience in customer service, retail, or related field is a plus.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Strong active listening skills and the ability to understand customer needs.
  • Proficiency in using computer systems, databases, and software applications.
  • Empathetic and patient approach to handling customer inquiries and concerns.
  • Problem-solving abilities and the capability to think on your feet.
  • Ability to multitask and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Detail-oriented and accurate in data entry and record-keeping.
  • Team player with the ability to work collaboratively and contribute to a positive team atmosphere.
  • Flexibility to work varying shifts, including weekends and holidays if required.
  • Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) systems is a plus.

  • Handle customer requests, such as order tracking, product information, billing inquiries, and technical support.
  • Maintain a positive and friendly attitude to create a welcoming customer experience.
  • Handle challenging and demanding customer situations with professionalism and a calm demeanor.
  • Follow up with customers to ensure their inquiries are fully resolved and their needs are met.
  • Participate in ongoing training and professional development to enhance customer service skills.
  • Provide feedback to team leads or supervisors to improve customer service processes.

Other Specification:

  • High school diploma or equivalent; some college education preferred.
  • Previous experience in customer service, retail, or related field is a plus.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Strong active listening skills and the ability to understand customer needs.
  • Proficiency in using computer systems, databases, and software applications.
  • Empathetic and patient approach to handling customer inquiries and concerns.
  • Problem-solving abilities and the capability to think on your feet.
  • Ability to multitask and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Detail-oriented and accurate in data entry and record-keeping.
  • Team player with the ability to work collaboratively and contribute to a positive team atmosphere.
  • Flexibility to work varying shifts, including weekends and holidays if required.
  • Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) systems is a plus.

description:
As the Senior Marketing Officer you will play a central role in shaping our marketing strategies and driving growth across our IT and Education verticals. With a comprehensive understanding of 360-degree marketing, coupled with proficiency in various digital marketing channels and contemporary trends, you will lead initiatives to enhance brand visibility, engagement, and conversion. If you have a minimum of 3 years of experience in related fields and a passion for leveraging the latest marketing tools and techniques, we want you to join our dynamic team.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, customer acquisition, and revenue growth across IT and Education verticals.
  • Create compelling and impactful content for diverse channels, including website, blog, social media, email campaigns, and more, to engage target audiences and drive lead generation.
  • Implement SEO and SEM best practices to optimize website traffic and improve search engine rankings, ensuring maximum visibility and reach.
  • Manage social media platforms effectively, including content planning, community management, and advertising campaigns on platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, and others.
  • Identify and pursue strategic partnerships and collaborations to expand our reach and access new markets.
  • Plan and execute targeted advertising campaigns across various channels, including Facebook Ads, Google Ads, YouTube Ads, and more, to drive conversions and ROI.
  • Stay updated on emerging marketing trends and technologies, including reel making, TikTok marketing, influencer partnerships, and other contemporary strategies, and incorporate them into our marketing efforts.
  • Analyze marketing performance metrics and KPIs, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement and optimization.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in marketing roles, with a focus on digital marketing and content creation.
  • Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns across multiple channels, with measurable results.
  • Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, social media marketing, content marketing, and other digital marketing strategies.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a flair for creating engaging and persuasive content.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, managing multiple projects simultaneously and meeting deadlines.
  • Creative thinking and problem-solving skills, with a proactive approach to exploring new opportunities and driving innovation.
  • Proficiency in marketing analytics tools and platforms to track and measure campaign performance.

Join us and be part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to driving innovation and excellence in marketing. If you are passionate about leveraging cutting-edge marketing strategies to make a meaningful impact, we invite you to apply and embark on an exciting journey with us

description:
We are seeking a talented UI/UX Designer with 3+ years of experience to join our team and help us elevate our user experience.

Job Summary:
As a UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for designing intuitive and engaging user interfaces and experiences for our products. You will work closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure our solutions are both visually appealing and user-friendly.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define user requirements and project goals,
  • Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs for web and mobile applications,
  • Conduct user research and usability testing to gather insights and validate design decisions,
  • Develop and maintain design systems and style guides to ensure consistency across products,
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in UI/UX design,
  • Present and defend design solutions to stakeholders, incorporating feedback as necessary,
  • Ensure designs are accessible and meet the needs of diverse users.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or a related field,
  • 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design,
  • Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or similar,
  • Strong portfolio showcasing design projects and processes,
  • Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices,
  • Experience with responsive design and designing for various devices and screen sizes,
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail,
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills,
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

description:
• Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve company sales targets,
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients.
  • Identify and engage potential clients to expand the customer base,
  • Manage the entire sales process from lead generation to closing deals.
  • Prepare and present sales proposals, negotiate contracts, and close agreements.
  • Work closely with the product development and customer service teams to ensure customer needs are met,
  • Monitor and analyze marketing campaign performance.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • Proven experience in sales and marketing roles.
  • Strong understanding of sales and marketing principles and techniques.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Proficiency in CRM software and marketing tools.
  • Ability to analyze data and develop data-driven strategies.
  • Strong organizational and time-management skills.
  • Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.

NOTE: Two-wheeler with a valid driving license is mandatory

description:
• Reports maintenance needs and follows up to ensure the work is completed.
  • Ensures cleanliness of the guest’s rooms and public areas such as gardens, swimming pool, restrooms, and other public areas.
  • Actively looks for ways to improve processes and increase efficiency in all aspects of the resort operations.
  • Ensure that all checklists, requisitions, and proper opening and closing duties are completed for each shift.
  • Responsible for keeping records of guests, billing and collecting payments, and preparing daily reports.
  • Identifying the training needs of staff members and delivering training according to the company’s standards.
  • Monitors stock level, orders supply required for resort operations, and applies cost control measures to increase profitability. ensure compliance with food health and safety regulations
  • Generates customer feedback and resolves issues quickly and effectively.
  • Promptly greets and receives the resort guests.
  • Provides exceptional customer service and ensures the team does the same.
  • Managing staff's work schedules, and coordinating and Assist in the day-to-day operation of the resort.
  • Supervise both front and back of house operations (Housekeeping, F&B service, Kitchen, Gardeners, Front office duties, such as checking-in and check-out of the guests).

Other Specification:

  • Bachelor's in hospitality management or equivalent,
  • 3-4 years of experience working as a supervisor in the hospitality industry.
  • The ability to work in a fast-paced environment & ability to stand for extended periods.
  • Strong management skills and effective communication skills.
  • Exceptional customer service skills.

What We Offer

  • Attractive Salary 
  • Bachelors Accommodation 
  • Duty Meal
  • Corporate Sim
  • SSF
  • Insurance Facilities
  • Dashain Allowance
  • Leave Facilities

description:
The Construction Site Supervisor is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of a construction site, ensuring that projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards. This role involves managing workers, coordinating with project managers, and ensuring compliance with safety regulations

Key Responsibilities:

Site Management:

  • Oversee all on-site activities to ensure smooth and efficient operations.
  • Coordinate and supervise contractors and construction workers.
  • Ensure that construction activities move according to the predetermined schedule.

Quality Control:

  • Inspect work to ensure compliance with plans, specifications, and quality standards.
  • Identify and resolve any issues or problems that arise on the site.
  • Conduct regular inspections and ensure all work meets the necessary standards.

Health and Safety:

  • Enforce health and safety policies on the construction site.
  • Ensure all workers and site visitors adhere to safety regulations.

Resource Management:

  • Manage and coordinate the supply of materials and equipment.
  • Ensure that materials and tools are available and properly maintained.
  • Control the project budget and minimize unnecessary costs.

Communication and Coordination:

  • Regular coordination with contractors, suppliers, and other stakeholders.
  • Provide regular updates on project progress to the Project Manager.
  • Resolve conflicts and facilitate smooth communication among all parties involved.

Documentation and Reporting:

  • Maintain accurate records of daily activities, incidents, and progress.
  • Prepare and submit site reports, drawings, and specifications.
  • Ensure all documentation is complete and up to date.

Qualification:

Education/Experience:

  • Diploma in civil engineering (sub-engineer), or a related field is preferred.
  • More than 3 years Proven experience as a construction site supervisor or in a similar role.
  • Experience in a reputed construction firm in Building construction is highly preferable. 
  • Extensive knowledge of construction procedures and equipment.

Skills:

  • Strong leadership and management skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
  • Ability to read and understand blueprints, drawings, and specifications.
  • Problem-solving skills and the ability to make decisions under pressure.
  • Proficiency in AutoCAD and MS Office.

Working Conditions:

  • Primarily works on construction sites, which can involve exposure to various weather conditions.
  • May require working long hours, including weekends and holidays, depending on project deadlines.

What We Offer

  • Bachelors Accommodation
  • Duty Meal
  • CUG sim
  • Leave Facilities
  • SSF 
  • Dashain Allowance

  • Manage the entire kegs production process to ensure efficient and timely output.
  • Develop and implement production schedules and plans.

Quality Control:

  • Establish and maintain quality standards for the production process.
  • Conduct regular inspections and audits to ensure compliance with quality specifications.

Equipment Tracking:

  • Tracking the location of all the Kegerators, refrigerators, chillers, and cold rooms with their current status in all places of our services.
  • Taking regular updates on the conditions of our services and ensuring the proper working of our machinery equipment in all the outlets.
  • Tracking every procurement process and ensuring on-time delivery of items safely.

Record Keeping:

  • Preparing a database of the current location of all the kegerators, refrigerators, chillers, and cold rooms through our outlets and their real-time movements.
  • Maintaining a database of each and every component of draft services including kegs, cylinders, regulators, couplers, pipes, and connectors with their real-time condition and status.
  • Maintaining and updating all items every time after new consignments and procurements.

Communication:

  • Communicate regularly with business outlets, Distributors, and Dealers regarding our services and make necessary inquiries.
  • Should be available for remote access to all service operators for immediate assistance with failures and queries
  • Act as a link to assist communication between the marketing team, maintenance team, and store.
  • Build relations and Communicate with local vendors and suppliers for urgent spares and components.
  • Communicate properly with transport personnel to get timely lifting and delivery of required items.

Other Specialization:

  • Diploma or bachelors Engineering (Electrical / Mechanical / Industrial/Refrigeration).
  • Strong knowledge of Management Information Systems (MIS) and data analysis.
  • Excellent understanding of production processes, quality control, and inventory management.
  • Proficiency in production planning and scheduling.
  • Strong leadership and team management skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

What We Offer

  • Bachelors Accommodation
  • Rs. 90 per day as canteen subsidy
  • Attractive Salary
  • Dashain Allowance
  • CUG sim will be provided
  • Leave Facilities 
  • SSF

description:
• Assisting in the collection of sterile samples and carrying out quality checks and inspection of incoming merchandise
  • Performs standardized testing during process and finished goods and other analysis prior to brewing & production.
  • Perform inspections of raw materials, supervise the assembly of the product, and inspect the final product
  • Ensure the brewery complies with the appropriate standards. The most important responsibility of the quality Executive is to ensure the brewery complies with environmental, food safety, workplace safety, and food ingredient integrity guidelines.
  • Ensure the quality of the components used within the brewing process to ensure they meet the quality standards that have been agreed to.
  • Organize and implement quality improvement projects within the brewery. The quality Executive will design and implement quality improvement projects within specific budgetary constraints. These projects should be designed to improve product quality, safety, and efficiency. They must work to ensure that capital is spent in the most effective manner possible.
  • Assist in analyzing quality assurance data. The quality Executive will process and analyze the microbiology of the beer being produced. They will then make recommendations to the brewers and management team for quality improvement.
  • Coordinate third-party audits and perform audits of the brewery to ensure standards compliance.
  • Encourage industry best practices in the brewery. The quality Executive will continually improve the operation of the brewery and encourage industry best practices on the production line.
  • Other assignment as per the business requirement and advised by the supervisor

Qualifications

  • B. Tech in Food Tech, BSc in Chemistry, Biochemistry, Microbiology, Food Science, Chemical Engineering
  • 1 year of working experience, Fresher can apply too

NOTE: Freshers are highly encouraged to apply

description:
• Support the Head Chef in managing kitchen operations.
  • Produces high quality plates, including both design and taste.
  • Oversees and supervises kitchen staff.
  • Assists with menu planning, inventory and management of supplies.
  • Keeps stations clean and sanitized, complies with food safety standard.
  • Monitors and maintains kitchen equipment’s.
  • Maintain high standards of hygiene and cleanliness.
  • Manage food costs and minimize waste.

Other Specification:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Culinary Arts is preferable,
  • Above 3 years in hotel/restaurant.
  • Imaginative cooking skills.
  • Mentoring and training ability with the culinary approach to a standard environment.

description:
• Ensure the safe delivery of the Machine as well as product to the defined Location.
  • Installation of Kegerators / Beer Kegs / Beer Towers / Co2 Cylinders/Compressors/Stabilizer /Refrigerators /Chilled Room in our business outlets, Distributors, and Dealers.
  • Ensure the zero leakage of product and maintain the quality parameters of Co2 pressure, Beer Temperature as per product requirements to eliminate the Foaming Issue as well as Beer wastage.
  • CIP (Cleaning in Place) – Clean the interior surfaces of all accessories of Kegerators like Coupling unit, Dispensing Head/Tap, Regulators, Gas pipes, Beer Pipeline, etc., and safe disposal of one-time Used Accessories.
  • Ensure zero gas leakages from CO2 Cylinders, Valves, Safety devices, Regulator & Gas pipelines.
  • Quick response to all major machinery breakdowns of Kegerator in our business outlets, Distributors, and Dealers.
  • Troubleshoot the issue and carry out the maintenance of the Chilling unit (Compressor, Evaporator, Control Card, temp. controller, etc.) of the Kegerator, Refrigerators, and Chilled room whenever required.
  • Identify potential Consumers/Dealers/Business Outlet requirements and plan for different Schemes. 
  • Identify the requirements for spare parts and change parts.
  • Identify the requirements of periodic maintenance and fulfill technical requirements accordingly.
  • Record keeping the kegerator location along with their status and maintain their history card.
  • Responsible for the Sales and Marketing of the Institutional Sales / Outlet Visit on Daily Basis and identifying the potential outlet for the Beer Kegs.
  • Maintain communication with our business outlets, Distributors, and Dealers to help troubleshoot the problem and provide assistance to sort out any breakdown in kegerators.
  • Training and developing the manpower in our business outlets, Distributors, and Dealers for better smothering the service.

What We Offer

  • Attractive Salary 
  • Daily Allowance
  • Fuel
  • Mobile Sim
  • Bike Repair and Maintenance

description:
• Lead the planning and implementation of hydropower projects from inception to completion.
  • Develop detailed project plans, including scope, timelines, resources, and budget.
  • Oversee all phases of project execution, ensuring adherence to project plans and specifications.
  • Coordinate with engineering teams, contractors, clients, and other stakeholders to ensure effective communication and project alignment.
  • Monitor and report on project progress, identifying and mitigating risks and issues.
  • Ensure compliance with all safety, environmental, and quality standards and regulations.
  • Manage project budgets, ensuring cost-effective utilization of resources.
  • Provide leadership and guidance to project teams, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.
  • Prepare and present regular project reports and updates to senior management and stakeholders.
  • Resolve any technical or operational issues that arise during the project lifecycle.
  • Ensure all project documentation is complete and accurate.

Other Specification 

  • Master’s Degree in Civil Engineering or related field.
  • Minimum of 15 years of experience in civil engineering, with at least 7 years focused on hydropower projects.
  • Proven track record of successfully managing large-scale hydropower projects.
  • Strong project management skills, including planning, scheduling, budgeting, and resource management.
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills.
  • Proficiency in project management software and engineering tools.
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
  • Ability to work under pressure and meet strict deadlines.

description:
• Oversee and manage all quality control activities on the construction site.
  • Ensure all work is performed in compliance with project specifications, standards, and safety regulations.
  • Conduct regular inspections and tests of materials, work in progress, and finished products.
  • Prepare detailed reports on quality control activities and findings.
  • Coordinate with the project team, contractors, and clients to address any quality issues or concerns.
  • Implement and maintain quality assurance processes and procedures.
  • Provide training and guidance to construction staff on quality standards and practices.
  • Assist in the resolution of any non-compliance issues and implement corrective actions.
  • Ensure documentation and records are properly maintained and up-to-date.

Other Specification 

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering or related field.
  • Minimum of 10 years of experience in civil engineering, with at least 5 years in hydro power projects.
  • Strong knowledge of quality control standards and procedures in civil engineering.
  • Experience with construction site management and supervision.
  • Excellent communication and leadership skills.
  • Proficiency in relevant engineering software and tools.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

description:
• Lead the design, construction, and supervision of hydro mechanical systems for hydro power projects.
  • Ensure that all hydro mechanical components meet project specifications, standards, and safety regulations.
  • Conduct feasibility studies, technical assessments, and cost estimates for hydro mechanical systems.
  • Oversee the installation, testing, and commissioning of hydro mechanical equipment.
  • Prepare detailed engineering drawings, specifications, and technical reports.
  • Coordinate with other engineering disciplines, contractors, and clients to ensure project milestones are met.
  • Perform site inspections and quality control checks during construction.
  • Resolve technical issues and provide engineering solutions to challenges encountered on site.
  • Mentor and provide guidance to junior engineers and technical staff.
  • Maintain accurate documentation and records of all project activities.

Other Specification 

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering.
  • Minimum of 10 years of experience in hydro mechanical engineering, with at least 5 years in design, construction, and supervision.
  • Strong knowledge of hydro mechanical systems and components used in hydro power projects.
  • Proficiency in engineering design software and tools.
  • Excellent project management and leadership skills.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a multidisciplinary team.
  • Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a multidisciplinary team.
  • Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

description:
We are currently seeking a dedicated and professional Pharmacist to join our team. The ideal candidate should have at least one year of experience in a pharmacy setting and possess excellent communication skills to interact effectively with both customers and healthcare professionals.

Responsibilities:

  • Dispense medications accurately and efficiently.
  • Provide pharmaceutical care and advice to patients.
  • Manage inventory and ensure the safe storage of medications.
  • Collaborate with healthcare providers to optimize patient care.
  • Maintain up-to-date knowledge of pharmacy laws and regulations.
  • Educate patients on medication usage and potential side effects.

Qualifications:

  • Minimum of 1 year of experience as a Pharmacist.
  • Valid pharmacist or A- pharmacist license.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment.

description:
About Letstrack Nepal: Letstrack Nepal is a leading provider of advanced GPS tracking solutions, committed to offering innovative and reliable tracking services to enhance safety, security, and efficiency. With a customer-centric approach, Letstrack Nepal has established itself as a trusted name in the GPS tracking industry.

Job Overview: We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Senior Accountant to join our dynamic team at Letstrack Nepal. The Senior Accountant will play a key role in managing the financial activities of the company, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and adherence to financial regulations. The ideal candidate will bring a wealth of accounting experience, strong analytical skills, and a proactive approach to financial management.

Responsibilities:

Financial Reporting:

  • Prepare and analyze monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports.
  • Present financial information to senior management, providing insights and recommendations.

Budgeting and Forecasting:

  • Collaborate with management to develop annual budgets and financial forecasts.
  • Monitor budget variances and provide timely explanations.

General Ledger Management:

  • Oversee the maintenance of the general ledger.
  • Ensure accuracy and completeness of financial records.

Compliance and Auditing:

  • Ensure compliance with accounting standards, tax regulations, and other financial regulations.
  • Coordinate with external auditors during the audit process.

Cash Flow Management:

  • Monitor and manage cash flow to meet the company's operational needs.
  • Implement efficient cash management procedures.

Accounts Payable and Receivable:

  • Supervise the accounts payable and receivable functions.
  • Review and authorize payments and receipts.

Financial Analysis:

  • Conduct financial analysis to support decision-making processes.
  • Identify trends, variances, and opportunities for improvement.

Process Improvement:

  • Continuously assess and improve accounting processes for efficiency and accuracy.
  • Implement best practices in financial management.

Qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
  • Professional accounting qualification (CPA, ACCA, or equivalent) is highly desirable.
  • Proven experience as a Senior Accountant or in a similar role.
  • Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial regulations, and reporting standards.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Proficient in accounting software and Microsoft Excel.

Letstrack Nepal is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds.

  • Opportunity to work in a rapidly growing segment of the automobile industry.

  • Professional development opportunities and career growth potential.

description:
• Manage and oversee daily operations to ensure efficiency and productivity.
  • Plan, coordinate, and manage all production activities to meet weekly and monthly production targets.
  • Ensure adherence to food safety and quality standards throughout the production process and in the factory premises.
  • Coordinate with various departments to ensure a seamless workflow.
  • Monitor production processes and adjust schedules as needed to ensure optimal efficiency.
  • Supervise and lead production staff, providing training, support, and performance feedback.
  • Report regularly to the head office regarding inventory positions, production reports, and KPI of factory teams.
  • Implement and maintain good manufacturing practices (GMP) and standard operating procedures (SOPs).
  • Collaborate with the quality assurance team to ensure products meet the highest quality standards.
  • Coordinate with the legal team to ensure compliance with all government bodies and agencies are met and renewed yearly.
  • Oversee the maintenance and repair of factory's equipment, and other assets to minimize downtime.
  • Manage and monitor inventory levels of raw materials and finished products, ensuring timely procurement and inventory levels for a smooth supply chain.
  • Analyze production data, monitor and analyze operational performance metrics, to identify areas for improvement and implement solutions.
  • Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations and promote a culture of safety within the production team and factory premises.

Other Specification 

  • Minimum Bachelor's degree in Food Technology or a related field with Business Administration, and Management experience.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in similar roles especially in the Food processing industry, or FMCG manufacturing industry.
  • Strong understanding of operational management principles.
  • Excellent organizational and leadership skills.
  • Outstanding communication and interpersonal abilities.
  • Proficient in using production management software and Microsoft Office Suite.
  • Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
